sect2.title: Component Description
sect2.para: It creates an interactive three-dimensional visualization of the catchment area. Spatially distinct attributes of the hrus attribute can be mapped and corresponding keys are available. In addition, it has a range of basic functions of a typical geodata viewer, e.g. pan the map, zoom in, zoom out or select. The display style of attributes to be visualized can be adjusted by an sld file and color shades. Extra shape layers can be added. An export tool enables the individually represented attributes (including additional attributes from the original shape) to be transferred to a new shapefile.
